formatDescription: Origin is an advanced plotting, graphing and data-analysis application by OriginLab. An .opju file is a full Origin project file in the OPJ format. An .oggu file contains only a graph. An ogwu file contains only a workbook. An ogmu file contains only a matrixbook Please contact the PRONOM team if you can provide a more detailed description of this format.
provenanceCompoundName: University of Edinburgh / University of Edinburgh

internalSignatures.name: Origin Project Format Unicode
internalSignatures.note: BOF Header, "CPYUA ", Major version, "." {Minor version, Build number}, 0x0A".
